translation.title: A non-standard Fullstack developer
translation.subtitle: Hello! I am a Fullstack developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in various technologies, I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to turn ideas into reality.

projects.title: Key Projects
projects.subtitle: Personal projects developed professionally, following best practices and with clean code.

cordiumjs.description: A library written in TypeScript for communicating with Discord servers, created with a focus on performance. This library supports Multicore (multiple CPU cores).

restman.description: A project that recreates the Postman website for educational purposes. This site aims to implement the main functionality of Postman.

dentist.title: Sites for Dentists
dentist.description: A simple site simulating a landing page for a dental clinic, created using NextJS, TailwindCSS, and Shadcn/UI.
